ExampleDefinition.Title: Sync Multi Chart Mouse
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription:
Demonstrates synchronizing of mouse events across multiple charts by using the MouseManager.MouseEventGroup attached property
Two SciChartSurface panes are created and arranged vertically, this example shows how to synchronize Zoom, Pan, Rollover and Cursor operations using MVVM to enable and disable modifiers

ExampleDefinition.HelpText: Select the toolbar buttons to enable and disable modifiers, then drag or mouse-move over the charts to see synchronization.
